Name: OpenRCA Cloudbed-2
Desc: A microservice-based online boutique application (cloudbed-2) from the OpenRCA dataset. Contains 10 services: adservice, cartservice, checkoutservice, currencyservice, emailservice, frontend, paymentservice, productcatalogservice, recommendationservice, shippingservice (+ redis-cart). Uses pre-recorded telemetry data (logs, metrics, traces) with 78 fault injection scenarios covering container and node-level faults.
